description: Structured information describing the terminology used in a brain atlas.

anatomicalEntities._instruction: Add all anatomical entities that belong to this atlas terminology.

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which this atlas terminology is stored in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this atlas terminology.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this atlas terminology.

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this atlas terminology.
